methods.description: Move task (i.e. the app) to the background.
methods.name: MoveTaskToBack

methods.description: Send a notifacation in n seconds with the corresponding title and text.After restarting the app, you can get the start text from the 'plain start text' block in App Inventor.
methods.name: Send

helpString: Simple Notification Extension. Version 3 as of 2017-01-16 for App Inventor version nb153 and Companion version 239.
name: TaifunNotification

blockProperties.name: DisplayBigPicture

blockProperties.description: whether click onto notification should be ignored
blockProperties.name: IgnoreNotification

blockProperties.description: whether Notification Sound should be suppressed
blockProperties.name: SuppressSound
